import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Info, ChevronDown, ChevronUp, Scale, Brain, BarChart2, CheckCircle2 } from 'lucide-react'; const RankingExplanation = () => { const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(false); return (
{isExpanded && (

This ranking was built through a sophisticated comparison process that works similar to how sports rankings are calculated. Instead of trying to rank all movies at once, we showed you pairs of movies and used each of your choices to gradually build and refine the overall ranking.

Smart Comparisons

The system dynamically chose which movies to compare based on their current rankings and how many times they'd been compared before. This helps us get accurate results with fewer comparisons.

Adaptive Learning

Each time you made a choice, the system adjusted both movies' rankings. Early choices had a bigger impact while later ones fine-tuned the positions.

Confidence Scoring

We tracked how consistently each movie performed in its comparisons. Movies with more consistent results and more comparisons have higher confidence scores.

Quality Checks

The system continuously monitored the ranking's stability and accuracy through transitivity checks, local performance evaluation, and overall ranking stability analysis.

The final positions reflect not just how many times each movie won, but how it performed against movies of similar rank, the consistency of its comparisons, and the strength of its opponents.

)}
); }; export default RankingExplanation;
